item.title: Giveitem for npchandler

item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

Ok well i got this…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 256)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage(“Great, You have defeted your first wave of monster, move to another one”);
ppl.teleportToX = 3275;
ppl.teleportToY = 3388;
ItemHandler.addItem(14511, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(14512, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(14513, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(14514, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

}

i want it to deposit it into there inventory not on the ground cause they get tellyed lol… anyway i tried just additem and it coudn’t undertsand it so please help thanks
